name: set-display-language
description: Check that the display language can be set.

steps.description: From an active session, click on the username
steps.expected: the gnome menu is displayed
the setting window appears
the region and language panel opens
a list of languages appears

steps.description: Click on some language different that the current one
steps.expected: the language is selected
a dialog appears telling that session should be restarted
a dialog ask to "cancel" or "log out"
the screen blackout and the logging screen appears

steps.description: Log in with the modified account
steps.expected: you enter your session
the gnome menu appears with items in the selected language
the settings panel appears with icon's names in the selected language

name: set-keyboard
description: Check that keyboard layout can be set.

steps.description: From an active session, click on the username
steps.expected: the gnome menu is displayed
the setting window appears
the region and language panel opens

steps.description: Click on the "+" of keyboard list
steps.expected: a list of languages appears

steps.description: Click on some language different than the current one
steps.expected: a sub list of keyboard variant appears
the new keyboard config is added to the list, the current keyboard language is displayed in the top bar

steps.description: From the top bar, select the language
steps.expected: a dialog appears with the several keyboard languages

steps.description: Select the new language for keyboard
steps.expected: the top bar language is updated

steps.description: Open a terminal and type a text
steps.expected: the letters printed follow the selected keyboard map

author: jb
